instruction: Construct a multiple choice quiz containing three questions about a chosen topic.
output:
Q1:Which animal has the longest lifespan?
A. Whale
B. Tortoise
C. Elephant
D. Lion

Q2:Which two animals are considered to be the most intelligent?
A. Crow and Dolphin
B. Elephant and Cow
C. Lion and Fox
D. Pig and Turtle

Q3:Which animal is native to Australia?
A. Kangaroo
B. Reindeer
C. Bison
D. Sloth
